column1: dialogues

Person 1: I need to find a spot on a train on Wednesday, can you help me find one? Person 2: Yes I can. Where are you going and what time would like to arrive or depart? Person 1: I'm leaving from London Kings Cross and going to Cambridge. I'd like to leave after 14:30 on Wednesday.  Person 2: I have 5 options available for wednesday.  You can leave at 15:17, 17:17. 19:17, 21:17, or 23:17.  What time would you like to leave? Person 1: I'll take the first one at 15:17. When does it arrive? Person 2: It will arrive at 16:08 Person 1: ok i am also looking for a place to eat in the expensive price range   and should be located in the west  Person 2: There are nine restaurants available. Is there a specific food type you're looking for?  Person 1: No, nothing in particular. Just anything you would recommend. Person 2: I recommend the graffiti located at Hotel Felix Whitehouse Lane Huntington Road.  Person 1: Can you tell me the food type as well as the phone number and address? Person 2: Yes, it's British food and the phone number is 01223277977, with the address of Hotel Felix Whitehouse Lane Huntingdon Road. Person 1: Thank you very much, that will be all. Person 2: Thank you for using Cambridge TownInfo centre.  Please remember us for your future travel needs.

Person 1: Can you please tell me how to get to the Curry King restaurant please?  Person 2: Curry King restaurant is located in the centre of town, address 5 Jordans Yard Bridge Street City Centre, postcode cb21ug. Person 1: Could I please get a table booked for 1 person on Sunday at 20:00? Person 2: Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.Your reference number is : PQ0VC3CL. Is there anything else I can help you with today? Person 1: Thank you, yes, I also need to find a train. I'd like to leave on Monday, departing from Cambridge. Person 2: Might I ask if you had a destination and arrival time in mind? Person 1: I want to arrive at birmingham new street by 11:30. Person 2: Fantastic, there are five options available to you, all priced at 75.10 pounds. They leave a minute after the hour every hour, starting at 5 am. Which would you prefer? Person 1: I'll take the third train.  For one person, and I need the reference number. Person 2: Hello, the reference number for your booking is B6OKTGHX. Person 1: Thank you very much. Have a nice day! Person 2: Thank you for using our system!

Person 1: I was looking for a hotel called worth house someone told me about. Person 2: Yes it is located in the north, would you like me to book it?  Person 1: Can you tell me their star rating and fo they have free parking? Oh and what area are they in? Person 2: It's a 4 star guesthouse in the north; Warkworth Terrace post code cb11ee.  They have free parking.  Would you like to book it? Person 1: No thank you. I am also looking for a place to go in the west section of town. Can you help with that? Person 2: There are several interesting places to go, from Whale of a Time to the Museum of Classical Archaeology. Do you have an idea of what sort of place you'd like? Person 1: Whale of a Time sounds good.  Can you give me the postcode and address for that? Person 2: The address is unit 8, viking way, bar hill, postcode cb238el. Anything else you need? Person 1: Yes, I will also need a taxi between those two places. I want to leave the hotel by 2:15. I will need the contact number and car type. Person 2: I was able to book you that taxi. Be looking for a red Tesla. If you need to reach them, please call 07304459127. Anything else I can help with? Person 1: thanks a  lot for the help  Person 2: you're welcome. you can use our services anytime

Person 1: I would like to stay at a guesthouse in the north.  Person 2: I have 11 guesthouses on the north side of town. Do you have a price range or star level in mind? Person 1: I would like it to be 4 stars.  Person 2: I have several moderately priced guesthouses available and one in the less expensive range. What is your preference? Person 1: I would prefer a moderately priced one please. Person 2: ok that narrows it down to 7 options. do you have any other preferences to consider? Person 1: It s have free parking. Person 2: There are 6 available and they all have free parking and wifi. May I suggest kirkwood house? Person 1: That sounds good.  What is the postcode for the Kirkwood house? Person 2: The postcode is CB4 1DA. What else can I help you with today?  Person 1: I need an architecture attraction to visit in the centre.  Person 2: We have some great architecture in the centre. I recommend Old Schools on trinity lane. The admission is free. Person 1: Okay thank you. I also need to book a taxi to leave the attraction at 5:30. Person 2: Could you please choose an attraction first? Person 1: The old schools attraction is fine. Person 2: Do you need any information? Person 1: I need a taxi. Person 2: When do you need to leave? Person 1: I need to leave Old Schools by 15:30, please. Person 2: Ok great and what will be your destination? Person 1: I would be going to Kirkwood house. Person 2: that is a great choice. do you need an address? Person 1: No, just a taxi, please. Person 2: When would you like to arrive by? Person 1: I only need to leave the attraction by 15:30. Person 2: I booked you a blue skoda and the driver can be reached at 07347836479. Is there anything else I can help you with? Person 1: Thank you for the booking. That will be all for now. Person 2: Thank you for using the help desk.

Person 1: I would like a Hungarian restaurant in the west of town. Person 2: There are no Hungarian restaurants in the west of town. Would you like to change your query? Person 1: Is there any Indian food on the west side of town. Person 2: There are 6 Indian restaurants in the west part of town. What price range do you have in mind? Person 1: The price range doesn't matter. Person 2: Would you like the name, address and phone number of a few of them? Person 1: Yes, but just for one.  Person 2: Cocum is located at 71 Castle Street City Centre and their phone number is 01223 366668.   Their price range is expensive.   Person 1: Thank you! Person 2: You're welcome. May I help with another query? Person 1: Nope, I'm good. Thanks again. Person 2: Goodbye.

Person 1: What entertainment attractions are there in the east side of town? Person 2: The Cherry Hinton Hall and Grounds is located on Cherry Hinton Road and is always a fun place.  Does that interest you? Person 1: That sounds great.  Can you give me their phone number? Person 2: Sure. Their number is 01223446104. Is there anything else I can help you with? Person 1: Do you have any information on their entrance fees? Person 2: Unfortunately, they haven't listed their entrance fees.   Person 1: That's ok.  I'll call them.  Can you help me find a moderately priced place to stay? Person 2: Are you looking to stay in the east? There are three moderately priced, 4 star guesthouses there. Person 1: What about 3 star places? And i need free parking. Person 2: I'm sorry there are no matching results.  Person 1: Can you try a guesthouse withouth free parking? Person 2: I'm not finding any guesthouses that meet your criteria. Would you like to try a different area, price range, or stars? Person 1: So you can't find a moderately priced guesthouse with 3 stars and free parking anywhere in cambridge at all? Area doesn't matter. Please try again? Person 2: i cant find it anywhere. can we change the price range? Person 1: I know I have found places with those requirements before. I just don't remember the name. I really want to stay moderately priced with the 3 stars and parking.  Person 2: There are no hotels matching your criteria in the East, but there are 3 hotels in the south, north, and west. Would you like to try one of those? Person 1: Ok,thanks anyway for your help Person 2: Are you sure you don't want me to check another area for you to stay? Person 1: Any moderately price guesthouse will work Person 2: I have the hamilton lodge located in the north. Person 1: Does it offer free parking? If yes, please book a room for 2 for 2 nights. We'll be checking in on Wednesday Person 2: your all set confirmation is EAD5DHHC. Anything else for you today? Person 1: No thank you that will be all Person 2: thank you for using this service good bye

Person 1: Hi.  I am looking for a train that goes to Cambridge on Saturday.  Can you help me? Person 2: There are 5 trains departing from London Kings Cross station to Cambridge on Saturday. Each will take 51 minutes. Is there a specific time you would prefer to depart? Person 1: I would like to leave after 12:00. Person 2: There is a train leaving London Kings Cross for Cambridge at 13:17 on Saturday. Would you like me to book it? Person 1: Yes, I will need to be on that train. Person 2: Okay, how many tickets would you like?  Person 1: I need 8 tickets. Person 2: Your booking was successful. The total fee is 151.04 GBP and the booking number is X1NEC9S5. Thank you again. Person 1: Actually, I need to depart from Kings Lynn, not Kings Cross. Can you change that please?  Person 2: TR7178 departs from kings lynn to cambridge saturday at 13:11, arriving cambridge at 13:58, would you like to book this one? Person 1: Yes, please book 8 tickets for that train.  May I please have the reference number? Person 2: Your reference number is POHLZ4EY and 62.72 GBP will be due at the station.  The train leaves Kings Lynn at 13:11.  Can I further assist you? Person 1: No, thank you. That is all. Person 2: You are welcome.  Have a nice day.  Bye.

Person 1: I'm looking for a train to leave on thursday to arrive at broxbourne. Person 2: Where would you be departing from?  Person 1: I will be leaving from Cambridge sometime after 7:00pm. Person 2: Train TR0146 should fit the bill. Would you like me to book you passage? Person 1: Yes.  I would like to book 4 people.  Person 2: I've made those reservations the reference number is 2LAGCY07 and the price is 71.59 GBP. Person 1: Thank you.  Can yo also find an entertainment attraction in the centre of town?   Person 2: I am sorry something more specific? Person 1: What about an attraction featuring architecture? Person 2: I dont have anything of the kind, should I look in another area? Person 1: I am looking for a attraction in the type of entertainment please,. Person 2: For some reason there are no entertainment attractions in the centre of town, are you able to go to another part of town? Person 1: Can you try again? There must be something. Person 2: Not in the centre. Do you have any other locations in mind?  Person 1: how about something to do with architecture in the centre? Person 2: There's plenty to choose from, and most of them have free admission. Person 1: I would like a architecture in the centre please.  Person 2: I recommend great saint mary's church, they are at market square, postal cb23pq, phone is 01223350914, entrance fee is 2 pounds but it is worth the admission.  Any further questions? Person 1: No, that's it. You've been very helpful. Have a great day Person 2: Have a wonderful time. Person 1: Thank you very much. Have a great day. Person 2: You, too. Thank you for calling. Goodbye.

Person 1: I want to find Kettle's Yard located in Cambridge. Person 2: it is located in castle street and got free entrance. can i give you the contacts? Person 1: Yes I would like all the contact info please.  Person 2: Their number is 01223748100 .They are located on Castle Street and their postcode is  cb30aq Person 1: What is the entrance fee for Kettle's Yard?  Person 2: There is no entry fee. Person 1: I also need a place to stay that is a hotel and includes free parking and has a rating of 2. Person 2: What side of town would you like to be on? Person 1: The area doesn't matter. What would you recommend? Person 2: I have 3. The 2 in the north are moderate priced and the one in the east is expensive. Would you like me to book one for you? Person 1: Can you give me the phone numbers for them? Person 2: Okay, the number for Ashley Hotel is 01223350059. The number for Express by Holiday Inn Cambridge is 01223866800, and the number for Lovell Lodge is 01223425478. Person 1: Okay thanks.  That was all I needed to know for now. Person 2: thank you and enjoy your stay!

Person 1: Can you find me a guesthouse that includes wi-fi? Person 2: I have 23 guesthouses with wifi. Is there a particular area of the city you would like to stay in? Person 1: Not a particular area, but I would like free parking.  Person 2: There are 21 guesthouses offering both wifi and parking. Are you looking for a specific price range or star rating? Person 1: No, I'm not particular about the price or rating. I do need it available Thursday for 3 nights for 3 people. Person 2: I booked a room at the Allenbell guesthouse on Coldham Lane.  The reference number is 7QVODJMI.  Can I be of any other assistance to you? Person 1: No thank you. Thank you for the reference number 7QVODJMI. Goodbye. Person 2: Thank you. Enjoy your stay.

Person 1: I need a train leaving from Cambridge. Person 2: Absolutely, what day of departure and what destination location? Person 1: I am heading to London Kings Cross and would need the train for Wednesday please. Oh and I need to leave after 18:00 sometime.  Person 2: Okay, the TR8676	train leaves at 19:00 and arrives at 19:51. Would you like to purchase tickets?  Person 1: Yes I need that for 3 people please. Person 2: I have booked your tickets. 70.8 GBP is payable at the station. The reference number is JLCUPIN6 Person 1: Thanks, that's all I need. Have a nice day. Person 2: My pleasure. Thank you.

Person 1: Are there any chinese food restaurants in the south? Person 2: there are 3. what is your price range? Person 1: Thank you! I do not care about the price range. Person 2: How about peking restaurant?  Person 1: Great, could we have a table for 8 on monday at 17:00? Person 2: Your table at the Peking Restaurant is booked, ref #N2XF9GWQ. Can I help you with anything else today? Person 1: Yes, I need a guesthouse with free wifi. Person 2: There are 23 guesthouses with free wifi. Would you like to stay in the south near the restaurant? Person 1: Yes please, and I'll need free parking as well. Person 2: I think allenbell would fit your needs. Want me to book it? Person 1: Well how many stars does it have? Person 2: My apologies. Allenbell is not in the south. However, I highly recommend the 4 star Aylesbray Lodge located in the south and moderately priced. Can I help you with your booking? Person 1: How many stars, also the postcode and address? I will also need a taxi and want it to arrive by 17:00. Contact number and car type. Person 2: It is four stars. 5 Mowbray road. Shall I book it? Person 1: just find me the postcode and address. Person 2: The address is 5 mowbray road in the postcode, cb17sr. Do you still need a taxi? Person 1: Yes. I'm leaving Aylesbray Lodge and need to be at Peking Restaurant by 17:00. Please get me the contact number and car type. Person 2: I've booked you a yellow BMW departing the guesthouse and arriving and peking restaurant prior to your 17:00 reservation. You can reach the driver at 07462630170. Person 1: Thanks. That is all for today. Person 2: you are welcome. enjoy your stay.

Person 1: Yes, I'm looking for hotels in the north area.  Person 2: There are 13 hotels north of cambridge. What price range would you prefer? Do you require internet or parking? Person 1: I don't care about price range or parking, but I do require free WiFi. Person 2: Would you like me to book you a room at the Avalon on 62 Gilbert Road? Person 1: I need it to be a hotel, not a guesthouse. Person 2: How about the ashley hotel, it is in the north with a 2 star rating with free parking and internet. Would you like to reserve a room? Person 1: Not now. I would like to get the postcode, please. Person 2: Certainly, the postcode for the Ashley Hotel is cb41er. Is there anything else I can do for you? Person 1: Thank you. I also need to find a train departing from Leicester. Person 2: I can certainly help you with that! Can I assume you're coming from Leicester to fair Cambridge? What day and time would you like to travel? Person 1: Yes, you're right. I need to leave on Monday, and I need to arrive by 18:15. Person 2: I found TR3173 leaving at 5:09 would that work? Person 1: Can it get there by 18:15? And can you get tickets for two? Person 2: Your arrival time would be 06:54 would you like for me to find another train for you? Person 1: Yes, please. I'd rather not be that early. Person 2: Certainly! TR2985 will depart Leicester at 16:09 and arrive in Cambridge at 17:54. That one sounds like it's better for your time frame. Person 1: Great, if you could book that one for 2 people and provide me with the reference number, I would appreciate it.  Person 2: Sure, I have booked the train for  people on monday on TR2985, your reference number is 730ZJ7M6. Is there anything else I can do for you today? Person 1: There is not. Thank you so much! Person 2: You're welcome and have a wonderful trip!

Person 1: How do I locate the closest police station? Person 2: The closest station is at  Parkside, Cambridge, in the postal code CB11JG. Person 1: Thank you so much. Could you also provide me with the phone number? Person 2: Their phone number is 01223358966. Is there anything else I can help you with? Person 1: No, that's all that I need. Thank you very much. Person 2: thank for inquiring with us

Person 1: I am looking for a train to Cambridge on Saturday. Person 2: certainly, do you know from where you will be departing, and at what time? Person 1: I will depart at Birmingham New Street and should arrive by 11:30. Can you help me with this? Person 2: Of course I can. There are 6 possibilities, at what time would you like to leave?

Person 1: I need a train to Ely after 08:15, please. Person 2: What day would you like to travel? Person 1: I'd like to leave Cambridge on Wednesday, please. Person 2: There are no trains on Wednesday. Person 1: I need you to check again. Train from Ely to Cambridge.  Person 2: OK, the earliest train after 08:15 is the 09:50 to Cambridge. It's a quick, 17-minute trip. Would you like to book seats? Person 1: Sounds great, what is the price and arrival time? Person 2: It will cost you 4.40 pounds and it arrives by 10:07. Person 1: Thanks! I'm also looking for someplace to eat in the center of town. Something in the moderate price range. Person 2: What type of food would you like to eat? Person 1: Type of food doesn't matter, what would you prefer? Person 2: I recommend cotto.  It has British cuisine.  Would you like reservations? Person 1: Yes, there will be 4 of us on Wednesday at 11:00. Please book. Person 2: I have made those reservations and your reference number is KOSM5AJ9. Person 1: Awesome, thanks for all your help! Good day Person 2: Thank you for contacting us and have a nice day.

Person 1: Are there any Italian restaurants in the city centre? Person 2: There are quite a few Italian restaurants in the centre. Would you like something cheap, moderately priced, or more expensive?  Person 1: I would like something in the cheap range and i need the address and phone number  Person 2: Sure, how about Pizza Hut City Centre? It's at Regent Street City Centre cb21ab and can be reached at 01223323737. May I help with anything else? Person 1: Yes, please. I would like information about the Ashley Hotel.   Person 2: The Ashley Hotel is in the north part of town. It is a moderately priced two star hotel with internet service and parking. Would you like to make a reservation? Person 1: Yes, 3 people, 5 nights starting from wednesday. Reference number please. Person 2: Booking was successful. Reference number is KJGGRH7E.  Person 1: Thanks. I'd like to get a taxi as well leaving the restaurant by 08:15. Can I get the contact number and the car type for that please? Person 2: I need a little more information to schedule your taxi.  What is your destination? Person 1: I'll be going from the restaurant we talked about (Pizza Hut City Centre) to the hotel you booked for me (the Ashley).  Person 2: I have booked your taxi. Be looking for a white Toyota. If you need to contact them, please call them at 07948315819. Anything more I can help with? Person 1: No that is all I needed thank you. Person 2: You're welcome, have a nice day.

Person 1: I'm currently planning a visit to Cambridge and looking for a cheap place to stay.  I don't need internet or any frills.  Any good suggestions?  Person 2: I have none listed like that,a different price range maybe? Person 1: So, you are saying there are no cheap hotels in all of Cambridge?  Can you maybe look one more time?  Thanks! Person 2: sorry about that! why yes, there are 10 options for inexpensive hotels. Person 1: I would like to have a 4 star rating with free parking. Person 2: I would suggest autumn house Person 1: Sounds good. 1 person, 4 nights and leaving from Wednesday.  Person 2: Booking was successful.Reference number is : AENEDXFY Person 1: I also need a restaurant, preferably one that serves portuguese food and is the same price point as my hotel. Person 2: There are two options here. Would you prefer the south or the centre? Person 1: I don't mind. Surprise me! Person 2: Nandos is located both in the south and in the centre. Would you like me to make a reservation for you? Person 1: Yes, that would be fantastic. Thank you very much. Person 2: How many people for the restaurant? Person 1: There will be just me.  Person 2: What date and time for your reservation? Person 1: The reservation should be at 13:00 Person 2: I am unable to book it right now. Person 1: Can you try the other restaurant? Person 2: Would you like me to make you a reservation at nandos city centre? Person 1: Sure. Just give me the reference number once you do it Person 2: I am in the process of completing your reservation and nandos city centre. What day will you be dining? Person 1: Make the reservation for wednesday and then give me the reference number Person 2: You are set, ref number is CPD3XEJI is there anything else I can help you with? Person 1: No I think I bugged you enough! You have been great and fast too! Person 2: Thank you for using our service, and enjoy your time in Cambridge!

Person 1: There is a place I want to see, can you help me? Person 2: I certainly hope so! We have a lot of interesting places to see in Cambridge. Is there something specific you're looking for? Person 1: I am looking for a attraction called cineworld cinema.  Person 2: It's located in southern Cambridge at cambridge leisure park, clifton way. It's phone number is 00872208000. Do you need anything else? Person 1: Yes, can you help me find a place to eat? Person 2: What type of food would you like? Person 1: Actually never mind.  I would actually like just find a place to stay in the cheap price range in the west. Person 2: Sure, I can help you with that.  Was there a particular type of cuisine you were interested in?  Person 1: The hotel I'm looking for should have a star of 4, in the cheap range, somewhere in the West. It'll be for 3 people and 4 nights starting Wednesday.  Person 2: Okay. We have you booked at the Cambridge Belfry. The reference number is Y8Y2HVXE. Person 1: thanks alot and is there parking for two cars? Person 2: I'm afraid I can only see that they have parking available. If you need to park two cars, I would phone them on 01954714600. Can I help with anything else? Person 1: Thank you, that is all I need. Person 2: Fantastic, enjoy your trip!

Person 1: I'm looking for a hotel with one star rating and free parking, can you help me? Person 2: I'm sorry, I can't seem to find a place that fits that criteria. Can I find you something else? Person 1: I'm looking for a hotel and it has to be a guesthouse.  Person 2: There are 24 guesthouses in the city. Is there a particular area you would like to stay in? Person 1: It doesn't matter what section it is in. Are there any guesthouses listed that have a 4 star rating? Person 2: a and b guest house is a nice place, with a  4 star rating

Person 1: I am looking for the attraction whipple museum of the history of science. Person 2: The Whipple Museum of History of Science is located at Free School Lane in the Centre area. The phone number is 01223330906.  Person 1: Great, thanks for that. Can you tell me what area of the city that's in, and what their entrance fee is? Person 2: They are located in the centre and no admission fee. Person 1: Thank you, can you also find an Indonesian restaurant for me? I'd prefer if it were expensive. Person 2: I am sorry but there are no restaurants that match your request.  Would you like to try a different price range or food type? Person 1: Is there an expensive Indonesian restaurant in the town centre by chance? Person 2: No there is not.  May I try a different area? Person 1: No, please stay in the centre, but lets try a gastropub. Person 2: i got two options, there is backstreet bistro and the slug and lettuce, which one could you prefer? Person 1: Slug and Lettuce would be a fine choice, I need a table on Friday for 2 people at 11:15. Person 2: Your reservation has been booked. Person 1: Can you provide me with the reference number for that booking? Person 2: Your booking number is DMNJIKFZ. Person 1: Book a taxi for me, it needs to get me to the restaurant in time. Person 2: I have that taxi booked for you. A Blue Toyota will pick you up. The contact number is 07584480415. Person 1: Thank you so much for your help. Have a great day. Person 2: Thank you for contacting Cambridge TownInfo centre. Goodbye!

Person 1: Hi. Would you happen to be able to suggest a museum in the east side of town? Person 2: I found the Cambridge Museum of Technology. It is located at the old pumping station on Cheddars Lane. There is an entrance fee of 5 pounds. Person 1: Great, that is very helpful. Thank you. Person 2: Can I help you with anything else? Person 1: Yes. I am also looking for an expensive restaurant that serves indian food.  Person 2: There are 14 expensive Indian restaurants in Cambridge. Do you know what part of town you would like to be in? Person 1: Yes I would like it in the same part of town as the museum please. Person 2: The Pipasha Restaurant is also in the East part of town and fits your criteria.  Would you like me to book it for you? Person 1: Can you book it for 7 people for 18:00 on Wednesday and then send me the reference number? Person 2: Sure thing! The reference number is 06G0MUZE. Is there anything else I can do for you? Person 1: No, thank you, that was everything I needed for today! Person 2: You're welcome!  Enjoy your trip!

Person 1: I need to take a train from cambridge to ely. Person 2: I can absolutely help you, but let's get some more information so we can book your ticket. What day and time would you like to leave?  Person 1: I'd like to travel on Monday, any time after 14:00 please. Person 2: How about train TR7177? It leaves at 15:50 Person 1: Yes please book one tickets please. Person 2: Ok your reference number is: YM5XXTVS. Total is 4.4 GBP and are payable when you get to the station.  Person 1: Can you give me more info about lan hong house. Person 2: I hope you enjoy your trip! Have a great day Person 1: Ummm, thanks, but could you tell me more about the lan Hong House restaurant? Person 2: Absolutely!  Lan hong house is a moderately priced restaurant in centre.  Would you like a reservation? Person 1: Yes, I would for 6 people on Monday at 17:30. What is their phone number and food type? Person 2: There food type if Chinese, and their phone number is 01223350420. Person 1: Ok, great! That's all I needed, thank you! Person 2: You are most welcome!

Person 1: I'd like to find an Italian restaurant, on the west side. Person 2: prezzo and la margherita are both Italian restaurants located on the west side.  Person 1: Which one is cheap? Person 2: La Margherita is in the cheap price range.  Would you like me to book that for you? Person 1: No thank you. Could I get the address and postcode please? Person 2: The address is 15 Magdalene Street, City Centre. The post code is cb30af. Can I assist you further? Person 1: i also need a place to go which should be in the type of a boat Person 2: camboats is located in the east or scudamores punting co is in the centre.  Person 1: Can I get info to the one in the east please. thank you,  Person 2: Camboats is located at The Plough, Green End, Fen Ditton and their phone number is 01223 902 112. Can I help you with anything else today?  Person 1: I'm going to need a ride to get to and from both places. Person 2: OK, what time do you need a taxi? Person 1: I would like to leave the restaurant by 03:45 please. Person 2: I'm happy to book you a taxi I need the following information to do so time of travel, name departure site, and name of arrival site. Person 1: In summary, I am leaving La Margherita restaurant by 03:45 to go to Camboats. Person 2: I have booked you a taxi. The contact number is 07041828683, and it will be a red Toyota. Can I assist you further? Person 1: That is all thank you. Person 2: Have a nice day, goodbye.

Person 1: I am planning a trip in Cambridge Person 2: That sounds great. Did you need a hotel, train or restaurant while in the area? Person 1: No, I'm looking info on saint barnabas press gallery. Person 2: Saint barnabas press gallery is a very nice museum in the east. What information can I provide? Person 1: May I have their phone number? Person 2: Of course! Their phone number is 01223902116. Is there anything else I can help you with?  Person 1: I also need information on a train from bishops stortford to Cambridge on Thursday. Person 2: Ok, I am getting the information up now, do you have a time in mind? Person 1: I'd like to get there by 14:30. Person 2: You have five options for a train that will get you to Cambridge by 14:30.  Do you have a preference on what time to leave?   Person 1: No, any available train would be fine. I will need four tickets, please. Person 2: Can you book it for me and get a reference number ?

Person 1: Hey, is curry king still open? Person 2: It certainly is. It's located at 5 Jordans Yard Bridge Street City Centre	 Person 1: yes and thank you for your help Person 2: Would you like to make a booking or may I help you with anything else today? Person 1: im also looking for a train from cambidge and shound arrive by 11:45 Person 2: Ok. What day will you be traveling and where are you headed to? Person 1: I will be traveling on Sunday to London Kings Cross Person 2: There is a train leaving Cambridge at 9:00 and arriving at London Kings Crossing at 9:51 on Sunday. Would you like me to make that reservation?  Person 1: Yes, please make a reservation for 8 people. Person 2: Booking was successful, the total fee is 169.92 GBP payable at the station .
Reference number is : JCP77LOL. Person 1: Thanks. We never did book a table at  Curry King. I would like to book a table for 8 at 15:30 on Saturday. Person 2: I have made those reservations and your reference number is 7I8PLAM0. Person 1: that takes care of everything i need. thanks for the help. bye.  Person 2: You're welcome. Have a great day!

Person 1: I will be traveling to cambridge and need lodging. Person 2: Alright. Do you have a price range? Person 1: Yes book it and please provide the reference number. Person 2: Okay, no problem. Will you be needing tickets for three people for the train as well?  Person 1: Yes, please book them for me. Person 1: Yes, could you please provide me with the reference number so I have it when I arrive at the station? Person 2: Your reference number is: YQDWLHDW. Is there anything else I can do for you?  Person 1: No thank you.  That is all I needed.  Good bye. Person 2: You're welcome, have a nice day.

Booked car type	:	blue tesla
